summary: This package consolidates utilities for migrating legacy Mission Support System UI configuration files to newer schema versions (8 and 9). It defines default UI parameters (map projections, interpolation methods, service endpoints, waypoint presets), reads and writes configuration data, merges settings, resolves duplicates, and updates JSON files to the current format while securely storing extracted credentials in the system keyring.
business_intent: Enable seamless upgrades of the Mission Support System by preserving user preferences and credentials, ensuring compatibility with newer releases, and reducing manual reâ€‘configuration effort.
